name: Simplus
tagline: Leader in Salesforce Quote to Cash Implementations
description: Simplus is the leader in Salesforce Quote-to-Cash (formerly SteelBrick) implementations. We are trusted by over 500 of the world's leading companies. We offer implementation, consulting, development and training services in CPQ and Billing. We also focus on Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Pardot, Community Cloud, Commerce Cloud, Platform & Apps Cloud.
